Header: Central Committee of SLFP to convene today
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The Central Committee of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party is scheduled to convene at 7.00 pm today (October 11). The meeting will be held at the President’s Official residence. This will be the first meeting of the Central Committee after the appointment of the new prime minister. SLFP General Secretary Rohana Lakshman Piyadasa said that the focal matter discussed at the meeting will be the present political situation of the country.
